identifier: lone star patio north texas:dallas, tx

data.name: Lone Star Patio North Texas
data.address: 6080 S Hulen St suite 360-225, Fort Worth, TX 76132

reviews.text: Josh and his crew did an absolutely fantastic job on our screened in patio. Not only was the work great, but Josh was always super responsive and helpful through the whole process from the first consultation through the final walkthrough. If you need your patio redone, I highly recommend Lone Star Patio North Texas!

Josh and his crew did an excellent job understanding exactly what we wanted, planning it, and executing it.  We are thrilled with how our cabana/pergola and outdoor kitchen remodel turned out.  Josh is professional, well skilled, reliable, very friendly, and is a great communicator.  You can't go wrong with Lone Star Patio North Texas.

We had a great experience with Lone Star Patio! Josh, Cohl, and their entire team were amazing to work with from start to finish. They were always responsive when we had a question, and showed up when they said they would. We love our new patio and will absolutely call them again next time we have a project. 5 stars!

I highly recommend Lone Star Patio North Texas in Fort Worth.  We have used them twice in the last 5 years and are happy with the results both times.  They are very professional, knowledgeable on all types of patios, and provide quality workmanship.  On the first job we received two other bids before deciding to use Lone Star Patio.  When we bought our new home they were the first call we made!

Josh was a pleasure to work with. He was always quick to respond to texts or calls about any questions I had along the way. His pricing was very competitive with other quotes. I am very happy with my patio. Thank you Josh for a job very well done.
Josh and his crews just installed a pergola and flagstone patio for us in Keller, TX, and we could not have been more pleased with scheduling, quality of work or the price.

Lone Star Patio built an outdoor entertainment area at our house. The design of our outdoor kitchen, and the craftsman that built it were 2nd to none.  Quality and attention to detail made our build a gathering place we are very happy with.  I would recommend Josh and his crew for any job.

Amazing finished product. Josh was in touch and answered all of our questions throughout the project. His crew is top notch. I would highly recommend Josh Coufal from Lone Star Patio. We will definitely use him again.
Josh and his team did a great job with our covered pergola. Really happy with the end result and they came in under our budget. Highly recommend.
Josh and his team did an ABSOLUTE FANTASTIC Job. I had a 14x15 with stone wrapped legs installed and he hit it out of the park. He communicates well and is timely. I HIGHLY recommend Lonestar!

This company was referred to us by another family member that spoke highly of their quality work and how pleased they were with them. We were extremely pleased and would refer them to anyone. Great company! Tony and Sue Kubes

We have used this company 3 times for screened patios. They have done an amazing job every time!! They have great customer service, stand behind their work and locally owned. You can't go wrong with Lone Star Patio North Texas!!
Josh Coufal is awesome!!! Will be contacting him for more work in future!  Great professional contractors!!

EXCELLENT COMPANY AND EXCELLENT PEOPLE
WANT QUALITY AT A FAIR PRICE CALL LONE STAR PATIO NORTH TEXAS
